game.title: Adventure Quest
game.objective: Find the treasure and save the princess
game.description: Embark on an exciting quest to find a hidden treasure, rescue a captured princess, and defeat the evil sorcerer who threatens the kingdom.
game.reward: A powerful artifact that can grant any wish
game.quest-giver: A wise old wizard named Merlin

task.objective: Locate the hidden entrance to the underground labyrinth
task.description: Entering the labyrinth will lead you deeper into the heart of the enchanted forest, where secrets lie waiting.
task.location: The ancient oak tree at the center of the forest

task.objective: Find the magical key that unlocks the treasure chamber
task.description: The key is hidden among a pile of ordinary-looking rocks, guarded by a mischievous sprite.
task.location: Behind the waterfall in the heart of the forest

task.objective: Defeat the evil sorcerer and rescue the princess from his clutches
task.description: The final battle will take place in the sorcerer's fortress, filled with traps and puzzles.
task.location: The top of a tall mountain overlooking the kingdom
